CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: （尤指在同类中处于）下面的；下方的；在底部的；低洼的；近底部的；近底部的较低的；朝海岸的；向南的；南部的；（low的比较级）
低；向下；不高；向…底部；低于通常水平；低于期望水平；在靠近…底部的位置；更低地；较低地；向下地；降低地；减少地；（low的比较级）
降低；减少；使…降下；缩小；把…放低；变昏暗；变恶劣；变阴沉
阴沉的表情；愠怒的面容

synonym.mean: 减弱，减少；放下，降下；贬低

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 使低劣的；昏暗的；减少体力的

word_group.brief_definition: 低水平；较低水平；水平低
下甲板；全体低级军官和船员
越来越有（或没有）抱负；期望越来越高
更低价格；较低价格；降低价格

bilingual.source: You can lower them if you are just going out for shopping.
bilingual.target: 如果你只是出去购物，你可以降低鞋跟。
运动有助于降低胆固醇。
运动可以帮助降低胆固醇。

bilingual.source: Lower the volume if it's too loud.
bilingual.target: 如果声音太大，请降低音量。

bilingual.source: Do you know how to lower systolic pressure?
bilingual.target: 你知道如何降低收缩压吗？

bilingual.source: The government plans to lower taxes next year.
bilingual.target: 政府计划明年降低税收。

bilingual.source: Students rally to demand lower tuition fees.
bilingual.target: 学生们集会要求降低学费。
共和党人经常主张降低税收。

bilingual.source: He is taking medication to lower uric acid.
bilingual.target: 他正在服用药物来降低尿酸。

bilingual.source: We cannot lower standards just to save money.
bilingual.target: 我们不能为了省钱而降低标准。

list.abstract: Lower()是SQL Server 2012中的函数，功能为将字符串中的大写字母转换为小写字母；用法是语法Lower ( string )。
《Lower》是엠버 (Amber) 、루나 (Luna)演唱的歌曲，由조윤경、Le'mon作词，Nicky van der Lugt Melsert、Sanne Huisman、MZMC作曲，收录于《Lower - SM STATION》专辑中，于2018年1月5日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe it's best to lower our sights, hunker down and focus on planet Earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许降低我们的眼光，蹲下来专注于地球最好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Say, for example, the Eurozone tries to lower its interest rate and reduce unemployment. Money flows out to earn higher interest rates elsewhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 举例来说，欧元使用区试着想要降低利率来减少失业。这样资金就会流到别的国家来争取更高的利率。

yingyinNormal.en: If someone charges less than you, customers will buy from them instead. So you have to lower the price or offer something better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果有个人贩卖的价格比你低，那么顾客自然会去向他们买东西。所以你必须要降低售价，或是提升产品的质量。

yingyinNormal.en: Not only because they prevent deforestation, but they actually use less energy and have a lower carbon emission once everything is taken into account.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把所有事情考虑进去的话，使用烘手机，不只可以减少森林砍筏，还可以减少能源消耗，降低碳排放量。

yingyinNormal.en: But to us, it's all about trying to identify and cut out as much waste as you can to lower your costs and improve the efficiency and the speed by which you do your work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是对于我们来说，都是在识别以及去掉尽可能多的浪费来降低成本和提高效率和你工作的速度。

yingyinNormal.en: One hypothesis is that for couples in healthy relationships, sleeping together promotes feelings of safety and security, which may lower levels of the stress hormone cortisol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中一个假说是指感情稳定的情侣，一起睡觉能增进安全感，降低体内压力贺尔蒙皮质醇的含量。

yingyinNormal.en: Higher or lower than what? This is embarrassing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么东西向上或是向下？

yingyinNormal.en: We merely slipped a little package into your lower tummy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只是把一小包东西放到你的下腹部。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, shall we begin? Lower shields. A wise choice, Mr. Spock.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，可以开始了吗？关闭护盾。明智之选，史波克先生。

yingyinNormal.en: And it all started right here on pearl street in lower Manhattan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它就在曼哈顿城下的珍珠街。

yingyinNormal.en: I imagine you'd like bail set at an amount lower than the ASA requested.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想你希望保释金低于助理检察官的要求。

yingyinNormal.en: What's the matter? I have pain radiating from my navel to my lower right abdomen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？疼痛以我的肚脐为起点延伸到我的右下腹。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is very good at limbo. Wow. But now we'll put the pole a bit lower. OK.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸非常擅长林波舞。但是现在，我们要把杆子放得矮一些。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, can you guys speak up? It's harder for us to hear you when you lower your voice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们可以大声点吗？你们放低声音，我们很难听到。

yingyinNormal.en: So you must try to be witty tonight, Mr Blake. After that, we'll lower our expectations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以今晚可要尽量诙谐点啊，布雷克先生，之后我们会尽量不期望太多。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, now holding sides of hearth in position, lower mantelpiece assembly onto top tabs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓住壁炉两侧，固定好位置，将壁炉台组合至壁炉上方。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I'm gonna ask you again! One last time, son. Lower your shields. Tell me where he is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，我要再问你一遍! 最后一遍，孩子，关闭你的护盾，告诉我他在哪里。

yingyinNormal.en: And I felt that the better approach would be to have a lower intensity and longer treatment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为最佳的处理方式是较低强度和较长时间。

yingyinNormal.en: And these expectations create different reality, and in fact, giving the same, lower quality of experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是这些不同的期望感觉，产生了不同的事实，结果实际上让一样的药品产生了较差的疗效。

yingyinNormal.en: No one warned us. No one said, "You are going to lose both engines at a lower altitude than any jet in history."
yingyinNormal.zh: 没人警告过我们，没人告诉你：你会在这种高度遭遇双发停车，比史上任何飞机都低的高度。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 降低；减少；削弱；（lower的现在分词）

word_family.mean: adj. 较低的；下游的；下级的；下方的；在底部的；（low的比较级）

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Lower</highlight>-income jobs like gardening or day care don't appeal to robots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像园艺或日托这样的低收入工作对机器人没有吸引力。

examination_example.sentence: Their grades are <highlight>lower</highlight> and their dropout rates are higher.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的成绩更低，辍学率更高。

examination_example.sentence: Stereotypes associated with obesity include laziness, lack of will power, and <highlight>lower</highlight> prospects for success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与肥胖相关的刻板印象包括懒惰、缺乏意志力和成功的可能性较低。

examination_example.sentence: I had gained weight in the form of muscle mass, but thinking only of <highlight>lowering</highlight> the number on the scale, I altered my training program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我以增肌的形式增加了体重，但我只想降低称上的数字，我改变了我的训练计划。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Lower</highlight> their present carbon-absorbing capacity
examination_example.sentence_trans: 降低它们目前的碳吸收能力

examination_example.sentence: This temporarily <highlight>lowers</highlight> carbon-carrying capacity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这会暂时降低承载碳的能力。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Lower</highlight> the costs of registered providers
examination_example.sentence_trans: 降低注册供应商的成本

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Lower</highlight> their operational costs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 降低运营成本。

examination_example.sentence: It is going riskily close to the implication that standards need to be <highlight>lowered</highlight> for poor children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这几乎意味着对贫困儿童的标准需要被降低。

examination_example.sentence: Oxytocin is made primarily in the central <highlight>lower</highlight> part of the brain, and some of it is released into the bloodstream.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 催产素主要在大脑的中下部产生，其中一些会被释放到血液中。

word_usage.usage:
lower作形容词，表示“下方的”时，在剧中只能作定语，不能作表语，如：
His lower lip trembled.
他的下唇在颤抖。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: move someone or something in a downward direction

examination_example.sentence: Why does the author say the USDA could have contributed a lot to <highlight>lowering</highlight> the climate cost through its dietary guidelines?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么作者说美国农业部可以通过其饮食指南为降低气候成本做出很大贡献？

examination_example.sentence: Even school pupils can have their CubeSats put in orbit owing to the <highlight>lowered</highlight> launching cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于发射成本降低，甚至小学生也可以将立方体卫星送入轨道。

examination_example.sentence: Contrary to analysts' doubts, the author believes drug prices may be <highlight>lowered</highlight> through negotiation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与分析家的怀疑相反，作者认为药品价格可以通过谈判降低。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: People who prioritise breakfasts tend to have <highlight>lower</highlight> calorie but higher nutritional intake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些把早餐放在第一位的人往往能摄入更低的卡路里和更多的营养。

examination_example.sentence: This is largely due to a <highlight>lower</highlight> risk of dying of cardiovascular (心血管的) disease among taller people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这主要是由于较高的人死于心血管疾病的风险较低。

examination_example.sentence: Manufacturers can produce consumer goods at a much <highlight>lower</highlight> cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制造商可以以低得多的成本生产消费品。

examination_example.sentence: Many studies claim that computers distract people, make them lazy thinkers and even <highlight>lower</highlight> their work efficiency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多研究声称计算机会分散人们的注意力，使他们懒于思考，甚至降低他们的工作效率。

examination_example.sentence: Farm machines helped <highlight>lower</highlight> their prices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农业机械帮助降低了价格。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>lower</highlight> domestic food prices, some countries limited or stopped their grain exports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了降低国内食品价格，一些国家限制或停止了粮食出口。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: move someone or something in a downward direction

examination_example.sentence: The people who exercise 150 minutes a week did pretty well, <highlight>lowering</highlight> their death risk by 14%.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周锻炼150分钟的人表现得很好，他们的死亡风险降低了14%。

examination_example.sentence: It turns out that just looking at green, growing things can reduce stress, <highlight>lower</highlight> blood pressure, and put people into a better mood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，只是看绿色，成长中的植物可以减轻人们的压力，降低血压，使人们保持良好的心情。

examination_example.sentence: People who put in 300 minutes a week of exercise had a 20% <highlight>lower</highlight> risk of death due to heart disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周锻炼300分钟，死于心脏病的风险会低于20%。

examination_example.sentence: During the training stage, each dog was shown only the upper half or the <highlight>lower</highlight> half of the person's face.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在训练阶段，每只狗只看到人的上半张脸或下半张脸。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 最低的；最小的；最底下的；低的；沮丧的；（low的最高级）

word_family.mean: adj. 较低的；下游的；下级的；下方的；在底部的；（low的比较级）

examination_example.sentence: It cannot <highlight>lower</highlight> the pressure but only to do harm both to own health and to that of people around you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不能降低压力，但只会伤害自己和你周围的人的健康。

examination_example.sentence: Getting on with animals can help <highlight>lower</highlight> animals' blood pressure
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与动物相处可以帮助降低动物的血压

examination_example.sentence: For example, researchers(研究者) have discovered that getting on with animals can help <highlight>lower</highlight>(降低) a person's blood pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，研究者发现，与动物相处可以帮助降低一个人的血压。

examination_example.sentence: She was born without the <highlight>lower</highlight> half of her legs and has worn prosthetic (假体) ones all her life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她出生时就没有腿的下半部，只能穿假体生活。
